wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Ivy Sterling was a British lawyer and Judge. He served as the first Attorney General of Hong Kong and as a Puisne Judge in Ceylon
.

response: Sirr, along with Paul Ivy Sterling was one of the first two barristers admitted to practice before the Supreme Court of Hong Kong at its first sitting on 1 October 1844.Norton-Kyshe, the History of the Laws and Courts of Hong Kong, Vol I p56
